title: Economy to start looking up in days ahead: FM after meeting pvt sector lenders
description: As regards slowdown in the passenger vehicle segment, FM was told that it was driven by 'sentiments' and will improve in near futureThe minister further said the private sector banks and financial institutions told her that the slump in commercial vehicle sales is 'cyclical'
